sentences.en: All the charm of their intimacy was gone.
sentences.cn: 他们之间那种亲密的闲情逸致也就此完了.

sentences.en: An intimacy grew up between us.
sentences.cn: 我们之间的关系亲密起来了.

sentences.en: And with the loss of strangeness, there was space for intimacy.
sentences.cn: 既然失去了陌生感, 就为亲切感腾出了地方.

sentences.en: Between them it was more the intimacy of sisters.
sentences.cn: 她们亲密得简直象同胞姊妹.

sentences.en: Fielding was not surprised at the rapidity of their intimacy.
sentences.cn: 菲尔丁对这种一见如故的样子并不觉得奇怪.

sentences.en: Her sunburn made intimacy too painful.
sentences.cn: 她的皮肤晒伤了，使得想要亲热一下都变得很痛苦。

sentences.en: I could recall no innocent intimacy.
sentences.cn: 我都回想不起来我们之间有过什么天真的亲密行为.

sentences.en: I have been seeing their intimacy with the greatest pleasure.
sentences.cn: 他们两人亲亲热热我看了非常高兴.

sentences.en: Modest intimacy descended upon the kitchen.
sentences.cn: 厨房里渐渐洋溢着淡淡的亲切感.

sentences.en: She still ached for the lost intimacy and sexual contact of marriage.
sentences.cn: 她仍旧渴望拥有婚姻中逝去的那份缱绻和肌肤之亲。

sentences.en: She thought back over the intimacies they’d shared and the plans they’d made.
sentences.cn: 她回想起他们之间曾经有过的亲密言行以及他们设想的计划。

sentences.en: The intimacy between these two was by this time consummate.
sentences.cn: 他们两人之间的亲密情谊此刻已达到高峰.

sentences.en: The intimacy of the room was enhanced by its warm colours.
sentences.cn: 房间温暖的色泽更增加它的舒适感.

sentences.en: The opening of the scene depicts Akhnaten and his family in a moment of intimacy.
sentences.cn: 这幕戏的开场描绘了埃及法老阿肯那顿和他的家人其乐融融的情景。
现在他们已经相当亲密了.

sentences.en: They were both the same, and it had produced first the intimacy.
sentences.cn: 两个人简直一样, 正因为一样所以双方才始而亲昵.

words.tran_cn: 亲密的；私人的；精通的；有性关系的
性行为；亲密；亲昵行为；隐私

trans.tran_cn: 亲密，亲近，亲昵的言行，性行为
trans.tran_en: a state of having a close personal relationship with someone
